name: Football Juggling ball 3D- Soccer Pop and Tip: A Funny Classical Goal Shaolin Soccer Cup Jump Game
name_original: Football Juggling ball 3D- Soccer Pop and Tip: A Funny Classical Goal Shaolin Soccer Cup Jump Game
description:
Difficult game is show! Dare to have a try?
How many times you can juggle these two footballs?
If you like football games or enjoy watching the football Soccer Cup in 2014 in Brazil, you will love this game!
Play our Soccer 3D game, have fun with Football juggling and can score goals to become League champion in this soccer 3d Juggling game.
How to play:
 - Tap left side of screen to kick the left football
- Tap right side of screen to kick the right football 
- Don't let the ball fall down
Warning:
 This game seems simple but it's very difficult.
